unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue! My kaka, Ramlal, lost half his tomato crop in Nashik back in 2022 due to pests. We need better, safer options, maybe like what IARI is researching. Heard something about it at 3 PM on 26/01/2023. It costs farmers like Rs. 5000 per acre. Less poison, more yield! Plus, gotta think of Ganga maiyya, right? Last time I checked, 15/08/2020, pesticide runoff was super high.
normalised: arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue! My kaka, Ramlal, lost half his tomato crop in Nashik back in two thousand and twenty two due to pests. We need better, safer options, maybe like what I A R I is researching. Heard something about it at three P M on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three. It costs farmers like rupee five thousand per acre. Less poison, more yield! Plus, gotta think of Ganga maiyya, right? Last time I checked, fifteenth august two thousand and twenty, pesticide runoff was super high.
